column4: U.S. safety agency criticizes Tesla crash data release
column5: WASHINGTON The U.S. National Transportation Safety Board said on Sunday it was "unhappy" that electric car maker Tesla Inc  made public information about the crash of its Model X vehicle on Autopilot that killed the driver last month.

column4: U.S. safety agency criticizes Tesla crash data release
column5: WASHINGTON  April 1 The U.S. National Transportation Safety Board said on Sunday it was "unhappy" that electric car maker Tesla Inc made public information about the crash of its Model X vehicle on Autopilot that killed the driver last month.
